ModMetaData.name: Ask Before Enter
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img]
Sometimes that trader caravan enters just at the wrong time, triggering the dormant mech cluster leading to the premature destruction of your base.
This mod shows a message as a trade caravan approches where you can tell them to not enter. You can also tell them to come back later, they will then return in about 6 hours.
